item.title: 碧桂园称其目标是在 5 月 13 日前支付周四到期的岸上息票
item.description: 陷入困境的中国开发商碧桂园表示，它无法支付周四到期的岸上息票，但它的目标是在宽限期内，于 5 月 13 日前支付这笔款项和产生的额外利息。【原文：Embattled Chinese developer Country Garden said it is unable to pay onshore coupons due on Thursday but it aims to make the payment and additional interest incurred by May 13, within the grace period.】

item.title: 中国特大城市、阿里巴巴总部所在地杭州全面取消购房禁令
item.description: 中国东部大都市杭州是中国最繁华的城市之一，该市周四表示将取消所有购房限制，以支撑其房地产市场，这使得其他城市也有可能效仿。【原文：China's eastern metropolis of Hangzhou, among the country's most thriving cities, on Thursday said it will lift all home purchase restrictions to shore up its real estate market, raising the prospect of other cities following suit.】

item.title: 早间竞价：英国央行将测试减息假设
item.description: Tom Westbrook 展望欧洲和全球市场的未来一天【原文：A look at the day ahead in European and global markets from Tom Westbrook】

item.title: 中国 4 月原油进口同比增长 5.45
item.description: 周四的官方数据显示，由于炼油企业为全面恢复的劳动节假期旅游旺季做好准备，中国 4 月份的原油进口量同比增长。【原文：China's crude oil imports rose on the previous year in April, as refiners prepared for a fully recovered Labour Day holiday travel season, official data showed on Thursday.】

item.title: 中国 4 月份出口恢复增长，进口超出预期
item.description: 周四的海关数据显示，中国出口在3月份大幅萎缩后于4月份恢复增长，这表明海外需求有所改善，政策制定者希望这种改善能延续到今年下半年。【原文：China's export returned to growth in April after contracting sharply in March, customs data showed on Thursday, suggesting some improvement in overseas demand that policymakers will hope extends through the rest of this year.】

item.title: 亚洲股市因关注中国贸易而低迷，日元在近期下跌后企稳
item.description: 周四，亚洲股市低迷，投资者在等待中国贸易数据，以判断中国经济的健康状况；日元在连跌三天后企稳，因为日本在谈论可能的货币干预措施。【原文：Asian shares were subdued on Thursday as investors awaited China trade data to gauge the health of the Chinese economy, while the yen steadied after three days of declines as Japan talked up a potential currency intervention.】

item.title: 华为新款 Pura 70 智能手机有哪些功能？
item.description: 华为新款高端智能手机 Pura 70 系列在上月推出后迅速售罄，分析师将其视为苹果 iPhone 的又一挑战者，更有迹象表明这家中国公司正在反击美国的限制。【原文：Huawei's new high-end Pura 70 smartphone series quickly sold out after it was launched last month with analysts touting it as another Apple iPhone challenger and adding to signs of how the Chinese firm is beating back against U.S. curbs.】

item.title: 独家：华为新手机使用更多中国制造部件和存储芯片
item.description: 一项拆解分析显示，华为最新款高端手机采用了更多中国供应商的产品，包括新的闪存存储芯片和改进的芯片处理器，这表明中国正朝着技术自给自足的方向迈进。【原文：Huawei's latest high-end phone features more Chinese suppliers, including a new flash memory storage chip and an improved chip processor, a teardown analysis showed, pointing to the progress China is making towards technology self-sufficiency.】

item.title: 关键通胀数据逼近，美元保持坚挺
item.description: 周四，美元兑大多数其他货币保持在较窄的区间内，交易商在等待关键的美国通胀数据，以寻找有关美联储政策的线索，而对日本和美国之间巨大利率差距的关注则帮助美元兑日元取得了一些涨幅。【原文：The dollar held tight ranges against most peers on Thursday as traders awaited key U.S. inflation data for cues on Federal Reserve policy, while the focus on the massive interest rate gap between Japan and the U.S. helped it make some gains on the yen.】

item.title: 摩根大通澳大利亚分公司因允许可疑客户订单被罚款 50.9 万美元
item.description: 摩根大通澳大利亚分公司被罚款 77.5 万澳元（509,252.50 美元），原因是该国企业监管机构周四表示，摩根大通允许客户在小麦期货交易中下达旨在操纵市场的可疑订单。【原文：JPMorgan's Australian arm has been fined A$775,000 ($509,252.50) for allowing suspicious client orders to be placed on wheat futures trading designed to manipulate the market, the country's corporate regulator said on Thursday.】

item.title: 石油因美国原油库存减少和美联储降息希望而上涨
item.description: 周四早盘，油价上涨，原因是美国原油库存减少表明供应趋紧，而且美联储将在年底前降息的希望不断升温。【原文：Oil prices rose in early trade on Thursday as shrinking U.S. crude inventories signalled tighter supply, and amid rising hopes that the Federal Reserve would cut interest rates by the end of the year.】

item.title: 日本央行董事会 4 月转向鹰派，许多人认为有必要进一步加息--摘要
item.description: 一份会议意见摘要显示，日本央行董事会成员在 4 月份的政策会议上绝大多数转向鹰派，许多人呼吁有必要稳步提高利率，以防止通胀超调的风险。【原文：Bank of Japan board members turned overwhelmingly hawkish at their April policy meeting with many calling for the need to raise interest rates steadily to forestall risks of an inflation overshoot, a summary of opinions at the meeting showed.】

item.title: 日本 3 月实际工资下降，持续两年下滑
item.description: 日本劳动省周四的数据显示，日本 3 月份经通胀调整后的实际工资同比下降 2.5%，连续两年下降。【原文：Japan's inflation-adjusted real wages in March fell 2.5% from a year earlier, marking declines for two straight years, labour ministry data showed on Thursday.】

item.title: 贸易协会调查显示 79% 的美国生物技术公司与中国公司签约
item.description: 华盛顿一家代表生物技术公司的行业协会最近进行的一项调查发现，在 124 家受访公司中，79% 的公司至少与一家总部设在中国或由中国拥有的制造商签订了一份合同或产品协议。【原文：A recent survey carried out by a Washington-based trade association representing biotechnology companies found that 79% of 124 respondents have at least one contract or product agreement with a manufacturer based in China or owned by China.】

item.title: 消息人士称，派拉蒙正与索尼、阿波罗商谈开放账本事宜
item.description: 熟悉内情的人士周三表示，派拉蒙全球公司正在与索尼影业和收购公司阿波罗全球管理公司（Apollo Global Management）组成的财团洽谈，该财团有意收购这家美国媒体公司。【原文：Paramount Global is in talks about opening its books to a consortium of Sony Pictures and buyout firm Apollo Global Management interested in acquiring the U.S. media company, people familiar with the matter said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 据《纽约时报》报道，索尼和阿波罗计划解散派拉蒙公司
item.description: 纽约时报》周三援引熟悉交易讨论的人士的话报道称，索尼影视娱乐公司和私募股权公司阿波罗全球管理公司计划以 260 亿美元的价格收购派拉蒙全球公司，并拆分该公司。【原文：Sony Pictures Entertainment and private equity firm Apollo Global Management plan to acquire Paramount Global for $26 billion and break up the company, the New York Times reported on Wednesday, citing people familiar with the deal discussions.】

item.title: Beyond Meat 报告亏损扩大，季度销售额下降
item.description: Beyond Meat 公布的季度亏损幅度超过预期，收入下降了 18%，原因是其价格较高的植物肉类产品的销量受到冲击。【原文：Beyond Meat posted wider-than-expected quarterly loss and an 18% drop in revenue as its higher priced plant-based meat products hit volumes.】

item.title: 迪士尼、华纳兄弟将提供包含 Disney+、Hulu 和 Max 的流媒体捆绑服务
item.description: 华特迪士尼和华纳兄弟探索公司周三在一份声明中表示，将从今年夏天开始在美国捆绑提供 Disney+、Hulu 和 Max 流媒体服务。【原文：Walt Disney and Warner Bros Discovery will offer a bundle of the Disney+, Hulu and Max streaming services in the United States starting this summer, the companies said in a statement on Wednesday.】

item.title: 早间竞价市场低迷，中国贸易将反弹
item.description: 亚洲市场前瞻【原文：A look at the day ahead in Asian markets.】

item.title: 新闻集团季度收入不及预期
item.description: 受广告市场低迷和图书出版业务实体书销售下降的影响，媒体集团新闻集团周三公布的第三季度营收不及华尔街预期。【原文：Media conglomerate News Corp on Wednesday missed Wall Street estimates for third-quarter revenue, weighed down by a sluggish advertising market and lower physical book sales at its book publishing business.】

item.title: 美国商务部长表示，美国可能禁止中国的联网汽车或对其施加限制
item.description: 美国商务部长吉娜-雷蒙多（Gina Raimondo）周三表示，拜登政府可能会采取 "极端行动"，禁止中国的联网汽车或选择施加限制，但必须首先审查广泛的公众意见。【原文：U.S. Commerce Secretary Gina Raimondo said on Wednesday the Biden administration could take an "extreme action" and ban Chinese connected vehicles or opt to impose restrictions but must first review extensive public comments.】

item.title: 连锁影院 AMC 季度收入高于预期
item.description: 由于《沙丘》（Dune：第二部》、《内战》和《堕落者》等影片为这家全球最大的连锁影院带来了观众。【原文：AMC Entertainment on Wednesday beat analysts' estimates for first-quarter revenue, as films like "Dune: Part Two", "Civil War" and "The Fall Guy" brought audiences to the world's largest theater chain.】

item.title: 灰度公司的以太坊期货 ETF 申请被撤回
item.description: 根据美国证券交易委员会周二发布的通知，加密资产管理公司灰度投资公司（Grayscale Investments）上周撤回了与以太币期货挂钩的交易所交易基金提案。【原文：Crypto asset manager Grayscale Investments' proposal for an exchange-traded fund tied to ether futures was withdrawn last week, according to a Tuesday notice from the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission.】

item.title: Bumble 预测第二季度营收低于预期
item.description: Bumble 周三预测第二季度营收低于华尔街预期，这表明在经济不确定的情况下，约会应用的可支配支出疲软。【原文：Bumble on Wednesday forecast second-quarter revenue below Wall Street estimates, a sign of weak discretionary spending on its dating apps amid economic uncertainty.】

item.title: Robinhood 从去年同期亏损转为盈利
item.description: Robinhood Markets 周三公布，公司第一季度实现盈利，而去年同期则出现亏损，主要得益于强劲的交易量和利率上调提高了净利息收入。【原文：Robinhood Markets reported a profit in the first quarter on Wednesday compared with a loss last year, helped by strong trading volumes and rate hikes that boosted its net interest revenue.】

item.title: Airbnb 因全球旅游需求而实现利润增长
item.description: 度假租赁公司 Airbnb 周三公布季度利润增长，主要得益于国际市场旅游人数的增加，而北美市场的预订量在此期间有所下降。【原文：Vacation rental company Airbnb reported a higher quarterly profit on Wednesday, boosted by an increase in travel in international markets as North American bookings decelerated during the period.】

item.title: Arm 季度营收预期好于市场预期，但年度营收指引未达预期
item.description: 芯片设计公司 Arm Holdings 周三发布的第一财季收入预期超出华尔街预期，但全年预期低于预期。【原文：Chip designer Arm Holdings , gave a fiscal first-quarter revenue forecast on Wednesday that beat Wall Street's expectations, but its full-year forecast was below expectations.】

item.title: 音乐流媒体公司敦促欧盟委员会驳回苹果公司在 App Store 案中的提议
item.description: 一个在欧洲代表 Spotify 和法国 Deezer 等音频流媒体公司的组织敦促欧盟委员会在一起音乐流媒体案件中拒绝苹果公司的提议。【原文：A group that represents audio streaming firms including Spotify and France's Deezer in Europe has urged the European Commission to reject Apple's proposal in a music streaming case.】

item.title: 纽约联储主席佩里提出衡量市场流动性水平的指导原则
item.description: 负责执行美联储货币政策的官员在周三的一次讲话中表示，最近宣布放慢收缩央行资产负债表的步伐降低了市场压力的可能性，他在讲话中还提出了衡量流动性何时可能变得过于稀缺的标准。【原文：The official responsible for implementing Federal Reserve monetary policy said in a speech on Wednesday that the recent announcement to slow the pace of contracting the central bank balance sheet reduces the prospect of market stress, in remarks that also laid out metrics for measuring when liquidity might be becoming too scarce.】

item.title: 随着米莱紧缩政策的实施，阿根廷工业产值跌至接近大流行病的最低点
item.description: 阿根廷统计局（INDEC）周三称，由于自由主义总统哈维尔-米莱（Javier Milei）推行严厉的财政紧缩计划，阿根廷 3 月份的工业产值同比骤降 21.2%，这是自 COVID-19 大流行以来最严重的下滑。【原文：Argentina's industrial output plunged 21.2% in March from a year ago, the INDEC statistics agency said on Wednesday, the worst slide since the depths of the COVID-19 pandemic as libertarian President Javier Milei pushes a tough austerity package.】
